titles.title: To waive time limitations specified by law in order to allow the Medal of Honor to be awarded to Chester G. Theissen, of East Leroy, Michigan, for acts of valor during the Korean conflict.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 2/12/1998--Introduced. Waives certain time limitations to authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to a named individual for acts of valor while serving in the U.S. Army during the Korean conflict.
